data: San Francisco, on the marge of the sea, with towering hills behind her, lay basking in the sun like a serpent by the side of a rock.

The Mysteries and Miseries of San Francisco
Showing up all the various characters and notabilities,

The Mysteries and Miseries of San Francisco
Showing up all the various characters and notabilities, (both in high and low life) that have figured in San Franciso since its settlement.
